name: ZPONGX
description:
Pong with a ZX Spectrum look, and multi-colored walls.

"The ball color must match the paddle color. You can change the paddle color by bumping into walls."

2 players are needed (no AI)… You can play alone, but it's quite hard & very challenging... let's say it's a feature!
Made for the MiniLD#56 (March 2015).
